---
category: news
title: "Dog-like robot runs autonomously thanks to bio-inspired design"
excerpt: "A dog-like robot can run autonomously once set in motion, thanks to a simple biologically inspired design and mechanical features. Researcher Mickaël Achkar at the Swiss Federal Institute of Technology in Lausanne (EPFL) studied dogs’ biological mechanisms to create a smarter robot design."
